title: More than three dozen dead, 100 injured after fire tears through crowded ferry in Bangladesh
content:
1. More than three dozen dead, 100 injured after fire tears through crowded ferry in Bangladesh  The Washington Post
  2. Ferry fire kills at least 37 in southern Bangladesh  Wisconsin Public Radio News
  3. Bangladesh: dozens dead after fire sweeps through ferry  Guardian News
  4. Dozens dead in Bangladesh ferry fire  Al Jazeera English
  5. At least 39 dead in massive ferry fire in Bangladesh | TheHill  The Hill
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
